about_the_game:
Cave Explorer is an exhilarating and immersive gaming experience that puts you in the shoes of a fearless gem hunter. As you delve deep into the mysterious and ancient caves, your objective is to uncover another precious sapphire, a gem of legendary value.

However, the caves are not only rich in hidden treasures but also home to a group of unwelcoming locals. These cunning inhabitants are not fond of intruders and won't hesitate to engage in a not-so-friendly dinner with unsuspecting explorers like yourself. Stay on high alert and hone your survival skills to outwit these adversaries as you continue your quest.

Navigating the caves is not without its perils. Throughout your expedition, you'll encounter menacing fires that threaten to engulf everything in their path. The searing heat and crackling flames present a formidable challenge that requires agility, quick thinking, and precise timing to navigate through unscathed. Failure to do so may result in being engulfed by the fiery inferno.

key features of the game
  • Thrilling Gem Hunting: Become a daring gem hunter and embark on an exciting adventure deep into ancient caves, searching for the elusive sapphire that holds immense value and mystery.
  • Perilous Encounters: Encounter hostile locals who view you as an unwelcome intruder. Stay on guard, employ strategic thinking, and hone your combat skills to survive their attacks and continue your quest.
  • Treacherous Fire-filled Obstacles: Navigate through hazardous areas filled with roaring fires that pose a constant threat. Test your reflexes, timing, and agility to avoid being consumed by the flames and progress further into the caves.
  • Challenging Puzzles and Secrets: Each level presents intricate puzzles, ancient enigmas, and hidden secrets that guard the path to your ultimate goal. Sharpen your problem-solving skills and unravel the mysteries of the caves to advance.
  • Immersive Underground Exploration: Immerse yourself in a richly detailed underground world, filled with atmospheric visuals and ambient sounds that bring the caves to life. Uncover the true essence of these ancient caverns as you delve deeper into their depths.

Cave Explorer is an exhilarating and immersive gaming experience that puts you in the shoes of a fearless gem hunter. As you delve deep into the mysterious and ancient caves, your objective is to uncover another precious sapphire, a gem of legendary value.

However, the caves are not only rich in hidden treasures but also home to a group of unwelcoming locals. These cunning inhabitants are not fond of intruders and won't hesitate to engage in a not-so-friendly dinner with unsuspecting explorers like yourself. Navigating the caves is not without its perils. Throughout your expedition, you'll encounter menacing fires that threaten to engulf everything in their path. The searing heat and crackling flames present a formidable challenge that requires agility, quick thinking, and precise timing to navigate through unscathed. Failure to do so may result in being engulfed by the fiery inferno.

name: Cave Explorer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Cave Explorer: Become a gem hunter exploring ancient caves. Find the sapphire, but watch out for hostile locals and treacherous fire. Can you reach the final level? Embark on this thrilling underground adventure now!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
